actions.in_subcommittee: Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: To amend section 110 of title 28, United States Code, to require that district court shall be held at Jersey City, New Jersey.

summary.text: Provides that the U.S. District Court for the District of New Jersey shall be held in Jersey City, New Jersey, in addition to those places currently provided by law.

titles.title: To amend section 110 of title 28, United States Code, to require that district court shall be held at Jersey City, New Jersey.
